mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM orders o JOIN payment p ON o.payment_no = p.payment_no JOIN address a ON a.address_no = p.address_no WHERE a.customer_mail = #{customerMail}

SELECT o.orders_no ordersNo , o.create_date createDate , o.orders_amount ordersAmount , p.payment_price paymentPrice , p.payment_state paymentState FROM orders o JOIN payment p ON o.payment_no = p.payment_no JOIN address a ON a.address_no = p.address_no WHERE a.customer_mail = #{customerMail} ORDER BY o.create_date DESC
